instruction: Create a Django application in Python to display a news feed.
buggy_code:
$ django-admin startproject django_newsfeed $ python manage.py startapp newsfeed INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'django.contrib.admin', 'django.contrib.auth', 'django.contrib.contenttypes', 'django.contrib.sessions', 'django.contrib.messages', 'django.contrib.staticfiles', 'newsfeed', ] from django.db import models from django.utils import timezone class NewsFeedEntry(models.Model): title = models.CharField(max_length=200) content = models.TextField() created_at = models.DateTimeField(default=timezone.now) published_at = models.DateTimeField(null=True, blank=True) def __str__(self): return return self.title $ python manage.py makemigrations $ python manage.py migrate from django.shortcuts import render from .models import NewsFeedEntry def index(request): entries = NewsFeedEntry.objects.all() context = { 'entries': entries } return render(request, 'newsfeed/index.html', context)

NewsFeed

    {% for entry in entries %}
  • {{ entry.title }}
    • {% endfor %}
